import requests
from datetime import datetime
import json
import re

class iOSSecurityAnalyzer:
    """iOS Security Guide and Updates Analyzer - COMPLETELY FREE!"""
    
    def __init__(self):
        self.security_guide_url = 'https://support.apple.com/guide/security/welcome/web'
        self.updates_url = 'https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201222'
        self.dev_security_url = 'https://developer.apple.com/security/'
        
        # iOS Security Features
        self.security_features = {
            'Hardware': ['Secure Enclave', 'Secure Element', 'Neural Engine'],
            'System': ['Secure Boot', 'System Integrity Protection', 'Kernel Integrity Protection'],
            'Data': ['Data Protection', 'FileVault', 'Keychain'],
            'App': ['App Sandbox', 'Code Signing', 'Notarization'],
            'Network': ['App Transport Security', 'VPN', 'iCloud Keychain'],
            'Privacy': ['App Tracking Transparency', 'Privacy Labels', 'Location Services']
        }
    
    def get_security_architecture(self):
        """Get iOS security architecture overview"""
        print("🍎 iOS Security Architecture (FREE!)\n")
        
        print("🏗️ Security Layers:")
        layers = [
            "Hardware Security: Secure Enclave, biometric sensors",
            "System Security: Secure boot chain, code signing",
            "App Security: Sandboxing, entitlements, permissions",
            "Network Security: TLS, VPN, certificate validation",
            "Data Protection: Encryption at rest and in transit",
            "User Privacy: Privacy controls, transparency features"
        ]
        
        for layer in layers:
            print(f"   • {layer}")
        
        print("\n🔐 Key Security Components:")
        for category, features in self.security_features.items():
            print(f"\n   {category}:")
            for feature in features:
                print(f"      • {feature}")
        
        return self.security_features
    
    def check_security_updates(self):
        """Check latest iOS security updates"""
        print("📱 iOS Security Updates (FREE!)\n")
        
        print(f"🔗 Security Updates: {self.updates_url}\n")
        
        # Latest iOS versions and their security features
        ios_versions = {
            'iOS 17': [
                'Enhanced Lockdown Mode',
                'Improved Safari private browsing',
                'Communication Safety expansions',
                'Sensitive Content Warning'
            ],
            'iOS 16': [
                'Lockdown Mode',
                'Safety Check',
                'Rapid Security Response',
                'Passkeys support'
            ],
            'iOS 15': [
                'Mail Privacy Protection',
                'App Privacy Report',
                'Hide My Email',
                'Private Relay'
            ]
        }
        
        print("📱 Security Features by Version:")
        for version, features in ios_versions.items():
            print(f"\n   {version}:")
            for feature in features:
                print(f"      • {feature}")
        
        print("\n⚡ Rapid Security Response:")
        print("   • Delivers important security improvements")
        print("   • Applied automatically between updates")
        print("   • No device restart required")
        print("   • Can be removed if issues occur")
        
        return ios_versions
    
    def get_privacy_features(self):
        """Get iOS privacy features and controls"""
        print("🔒 iOS Privacy Features (FREE!)\n")
        
        privacy_features = {
            'App Tracking Transparency': 'Requires apps to request permission to track',
            'Privacy Labels': 'Shows data collection practices in App Store',
            'Location Services': 'Precise control over location sharing',
            'Microphone/Camera Indicators': 'Visual indicators when in use',
            'Clipboard Notifications': 'Alerts when apps access clipboard',
            'Private Wi-Fi Address': 'Reduces tracking across Wi-Fi networks',
            'Hide My Email': 'Create unique, random email addresses',
            'Mail Privacy Protection': 'Hides IP and prevents tracking pixels'
        }
        
        print("🛡️ Privacy Controls:")
        for feature, description in privacy_features.items():
            print(f"   • {feature}: {description}")
        
        print("\n📱 Privacy Settings Locations:")
        settings = [
            "Settings > Privacy & Security",
            "Settings > Screen Time",
            "Settings > Face ID & Passcode",
            "Settings > Safari > Privacy & Security",
            "Settings > Mail > Privacy Protection"
        ]
        
        for setting in settings:
            print(f"   • {setting}")
        
        return privacy_features
    
    def get_developer_security(self):
        """Get iOS developer security best practices"""
        print("👨‍💻 iOS Developer Security (FREE!)\n")
        print(f"🔗 Developer Resources: {self.dev_security_url}\n")
        
        print("🔧 Security Best Practices:")
        practices = [
            "Use Keychain Services for sensitive data",
            "Implement App Transport Security (ATS)",
            "Enable Data Protection for files",
            "Use Touch ID/Face ID for authentication",
            "Implement certificate pinning",
            "Validate all input data",
            "Use secure coding practices",
            "Implement proper session management"
        ]
        
        for practice in practices:
            print(f"   • {practice}")
        
        print("\n🔑 Cryptography Guidelines:")
        crypto = [
            "Use Apple CryptoKit framework",
            "Leverage Secure Enclave when available",
            "Don't implement custom crypto",
            "Use appropriate key lengths",
            "Properly manage encryption keys",
            "Implement secure random number generation"
        ]
        
        for guideline in crypto:
            print(f"   • {guideline}")
        
        print("\n📦 Security Frameworks:")
        frameworks = {
            'Security.framework': 'Keychain, certificates, keys',
            'LocalAuthentication.framework': 'Biometric authentication',
            'CryptoKit': 'Cryptographic operations',
            'DeviceCheck': 'Device state validation',
            'App Attest': 'App integrity verification'
        }
        
        for framework, description in frameworks.items():
            print(f"   • {framework}: {description}")
        
        return frameworks
    
    def generate_security_report(self):
        """Generate comprehensive iOS security report"""
        print(f"🍎 iOS Security Report (FREE!)")
        print(f"Report Date: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
        
        print("=" * 50)
        print("🏗️ SECURITY ARCHITECTURE")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.get_security_architecture()
        
        print("\n" + "=" * 50)
        print("📱 SECURITY UPDATES")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.check_security_updates()
        
        print("\n" + "=" * 50)
        print("🔒 PRIVACY FEATURES")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.get_privacy_features()
        
        print("\n" + "=" * 50)
        print("👨‍💻 DEVELOPER SECURITY")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.get_developer_security()
        
        print("\n" + "=" * 50)
        print("✅ SECURITY CHECKLIST")
        print("=" * 50)
        
        print("\n📱 Device Security Checklist:")
        checklist = [
            "[ ] iOS version is current",
            "[ ] Automatic updates enabled",
            "[ ] Face ID/Touch ID configured",
            "[ ] Strong passcode set (6+ digits)",
            "[ ] Find My iPhone enabled",
            "[ ] Two-factor authentication enabled",
            "[ ] App privacy settings reviewed",
            "[ ] Location services configured",
            "[ ] Siri & Search privacy configured",
            "[ ] Screen Time restrictions set (if needed)"
        ]
        
        for item in checklist:
            print(f"   {item}")
        
        print("\n💡 Security Recommendations:")
        print("   1. Keep iOS updated to latest version")
        print("   2. Enable automatic updates")
        print("   3. Use Face ID/Touch ID when available")
        print("   4. Review app permissions regularly")
        print("   5. Enable two-factor authentication")
        print("   6. Use Sign in with Apple when possible")
        print("   7. Configure Find My iPhone")
        print("   8. Review privacy settings quarterly")
        
        print("\n📚 Resources:")
        print(f"   • Security Guide: {self.security_guide_url}")
        print(f"   • Updates: {self.updates_url}")
        print(f"   • Developer: {self.dev_security_url}")
        print("   • Privacy: https://www.apple.com/privacy/")
        
        return True

# Usage
analyzer = iOSSecurityAnalyzer()
analyzer.generate_security_report()
